snippet: The Blackstone Group said on Sunday that it would buy controlling stakes in two seaplane companies in the Maldives: Maldivian Air Taxi and Trans Maldivian Airways.
abstract: The Blackstone Group said on Sunday that it would buy controlling stakes in two seaplane companies in the Maldives: Maldivian Air Taxi and Trans Maldivian Airways.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED
